data.enText: to make sth easier to do or understand
The application forms have now been simplified.

data.chText: 我希望他任命以后事情会好办一些。
data.enText: I hope his appointment will simplify matters .

data.chText: 供小朋友阅读的故事简写本
data.enText: a simplified version of the story for young children

tr: make simpler or easier or reduce in complexity or extent
example: We had to simplify the instructions
this move will simplify our lives

value.def: If you simplify something, you make it easier to understand or you remove the things which make it complex.

example.ex: ...a plan to simplify the complex social security system...
example.tran: 简化复杂的社会保障体系的计划

example.ex: He reduced his needs to the minimum by simplifying his life.
example.tran: 他过上了一种简单的生活，将自己的需求降到最低限度。

example.ex: Last night, the president presented a shorter, simplified version of his speech.
example.tran: 昨晚，总统发表了一番更加简短明了的演讲。
